Name: Linear Programming
Description: Optimize linear objective function subject to linear constraints

Name: Integer Programming
Description: Optimize linear objective function subject to linear constraints with integer variables

Name: Nonlinear Programming
Description: Optimize nonlinear objective function subject to nonlinear constraints

Name: Dynamic Programming
Description: Break down complex problems into smaller subproblems and solve recursively

Name: Stochastic Programming
Example: Financial portfolio optimization, Supply chain management

Name: Quadratic Programming
Description: Optimize quadratic objective function subject to linear constraints

Name: Mixed-Integer Linear Programming
Description: Optimize linear objective function subject to linear constraints with integer and continuous variables

Name: Mixed-Integer Nonlinear Programming
Description: Optimize nonlinear objective function subject to nonlinear constraints with integer and continuous variables

Name: Convex Optimization
Description: Optimize convex objective function subject to convex constraints

Name: Semi-definite Programming
Description: Optimize linear objective function subject to linear matrix inequalities
